Comments.Message: Please attach the character file you are trying to load.

It happends when I try to load any of my chars from the armory:
Canea @ Moonglade
Tootsi @ Moonglade
Etai @ Moonglade

And I even got a new snippet today when I tried Etai, I get the same error when trying to load the characters in the webpage now so it feels like it's something with the installation on my mac
